--- title: "In-class_Ex06" author: "Zou Jiaxun" date: "Sep 30, 2024" data-modified: "last-modified" execute: eval: true echo: true warning: false freeze: true cache: true format: html: code-fold: true code-summary: "Click to view code" --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(sf, sfdep, tmap, plotly, tidyverse, kendall) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", layer = "Hunan") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Reading layer `Hunan' from data source `/Applications/SMU/S3/ISSS626 - Geo/ISSS-626 ZOUJIAXUN/In-class_Ex/In-class_Ex06/data/geospatial' using driver `ESRI Shapefile' Simple feature collection with 88 features and 7 fields Geometry type: POLYGON Dimension: XY Bounding box: xmin: 108.7831 ymin: 24.6342 xmax: 114.2544 ymax: 30.12812 Geodetic CRS: WGS 84 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GDPPC <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_GDPPC.csv") head(GDPPC, 10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 10 × 3 Year County GDPPC 1 2005 Longshan 3469 2 2005 Changsha 24612 3 2005 Wangcheng 14659 4 2005 Ningxiang 11687 5 2005 Liuyang 13406 6 2005 Zhuzhou 8546 7 2005 You 10944 8 2005 Chaling 8040 9 2005 Yanling 7383 10 2005 Liling 11688 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GDPPC_st <- spacetime(GDPPC, hunan, .loc_col = "County", .time_col = "Year") is_spacetime_cube(GDPPC_st) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] TRUE ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GDPPC_nb <- GDPPC_st %>% activate("geometry") %>% mutate(nb = include_self( st_contiguity(geometry)), wt = st_inverse_distance(nb, geometry, scale = 1, alpha = 1), .before = 1) %>% set_nbs("nb") %>% set_wts("wt") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gi_stars <- GDPPC_nb %>% group_by(Year) %>% mutate(gi_stars = local_gstar_perm( GDPPC, nb, wt )) %>% tidyr::unnest(gi_stars) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cbg <- gi_stars %>% ungroup() %>% filter(County == "Changsha") |> select(County, Year, gi_star) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(data = cbg, aes(x = Year, y = gi_star)) + geom_line() + theme_light() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex06_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} p <- ggplot(data = cbg, aes(x = Year, y = gi_star)) + geom_line() + theme_light() ggplotly(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} cbg %>% summarise(mk = list( unclass( Kendall::MannKendall(gi_star)))) %>% tidyr::unnest_wider(mk) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 1 × 5 tau sl S D varS 1 0.485 0.00742 66 136. 589. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ehsa <- gi_stars %>% group_by(County) %>% summarise(mk = list( unclass( Kendall::MannKendall(gi_star)))) %>% tidyr::unnest_wider(mk) ehsa ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 88 × 6 County tau sl S D varS 1 Anhua 0.191 0.303 26 136. 589. 2 Anren -0.294 0.108 -40 136. 589. 3 Anxiang 0 1 0 136. 589. 4 Baojing -0.691 0.000128 -94 136. 589. 5 Chaling -0.0882 0.650 -12 136. 589. 6 Changning -0.750 0.0000318 -102 136. 589. 7 Changsha 0.485 0.00742 66 136. 589. 8 Chengbu -0.824 0.00000482 -112 136. 589. 9 Chenxi -0.118 0.537 -16 136. 589. 10 Cili 0.103 0.592 14 136. 589. # ℹ 78 more rows ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # emerging <- ehsa %>% # arrange(sl, abs(tau)) %>% # slice(1:10) # head(emerging) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ehsa <- emerging_hotspot_analysis(x = GDPPC_st, .var = "GDPPC", k = 1, nsim = 99) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot(data = ehsa, aes(x = classification)) + geom_bar() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex06_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} hunan_ehsa <- hunan %>% left_join(ehsa, by = join_by(County == location)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ehsa_sig <- hunan_ehsa %>% filter(p_value < 0.05) tmap_mode("plot") tm_shape(hunan_ehsa) + tm_polygons() + tm_borders(alpha = 0.5) + tm_shape(ehsa_sig) + tm_fill("classification") + tm_borders(alpha = 0.4) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](In-class_Ex06_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
